home.subheaderText: Take Workout Tracking to the Next Level
home.appFeatureP: This is how we help in optimizing the results you achieve at the gym

featureList.featureOneDetails: Dynamic representation of your fitness journey, they can be displayed across various timelines, including weekly, monthly, and yearly intervals.
featureList.featureTwoDetails: View a comprehensive overview of your weekly workouts at a glance, with each day's focus and planned exercises laid out for you.
featureList.featureThreeDetails: Enjoy the freedom to switch up your routine regularly. A wide range of muscle group recommended exercises are available to you at your fingertips.

footer.designedBy: Designed and crafted by Leeyan Haw, this workout app began as a portfolio project but quickly evolved into a daily companion in my friends and my fitness journey. Inspired by the support and motivation from my partner and son!
